verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אִיּ֗וֹב <S%H347><s%> Then Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long אָ֭נָה <S%H575><s%> How תּוֹגְי֣וּן <S%H3013><s%> How long will ye vex נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> my soul וּֽתְדַכְּאוּנַ֥נִי <S%H1792><s%> and break בְמִלִּֽים׃ <S%H4405><s%> answer

זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> These עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> These ten פְּ֭עָמִים <S%H6471><s%> times תַּכְלִימ֑וּנִי <S%H3637><s%> have ye reproached לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not תֵ֝בֹ֗שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> me ye are not ashamed תַּהְכְּרוּ־ <S%H1970><s%> [that] ye make yourselves strange לִֽי׃

וְאַף־ <S%H637><s%> Even אָמְנָ֥ם <S%H551><s%> And be it indeed שָׁגִ֑יתִי <S%H7686><s%> [that] I have erred אִ֝תִּ֗י <S%H854><s%> for תָּלִ֥ין <S%H3885><s%> remaineth מְשׁוּגָתִֽי׃ <S%H4879><s%> mine error

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אָ֭מְנָם <S%H551><s%> If indeed עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> against תַּגְדִּ֑ילוּ <S%H1431><s%> ye will magnify וְתוֹכִ֥יחוּ <S%H3198><s%> [yourselves] against me and plead עָ֝לַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> against חֶרְפָּתִּֽי׃ <S%H2781><s%> against me my reproach

דְּֽעוּ־ <S%H3045><s%> Know אֵ֭פוֹ <S%H645><s%> now כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> that God עִוְּתָ֑נִי <S%H5791><s%> hath overthrown וּ֝מְצוּד֗וֹ <S%H4686><s%> me with his net עָלַ֥י <S%H5921><s%> and has הִקִּֽיף׃ <S%H5362><s%> me and hath compassed

הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold אֶצְעַ֣ק <S%H6817><s%> Behold I cry out חָ֭מָס <S%H2555><s%> of wrong וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no אֵעָנֶ֑ה <S%H6030><s%> but I am not heard אֲ֝שַׁוַּ֗ע <S%H7768><s%> I cry aloud וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> but [there is] no judgment

אָרְחִ֣י <S%H734><s%> my way גָ֭דַר <S%H1443><s%> He hath fenced up וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot אֶעֱב֑וֹר <S%H5674><s%> that I cannot pass וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> on נְ֝תִיבוֹתַ֗י <S%H5410><s%> in my paths חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> darkness יָשִֽׂים׃ <S%H7760><s%> and he hath set

כְּ֭בוֹדִי <S%H3519><s%> me of my glory מֵעָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and הִפְשִׁ֑יט <S%H6584><s%> He hath stripped וַ֝יָּ֗סַר <S%H5493><s%> and taken עֲטֶ֣רֶת <S%H5850><s%> the crown רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <S%H7218><s%> [from] my head

יִתְּצֵ֣נִי <S%H5422><s%> He hath destroyed סָ֭בִיב <S%H5439><s%> me on every side וָאֵלַ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> am gone וַיַּסַּ֥ע <S%H5265><s%> hath he removed כָּ֝עֵ֗ץ <S%H6086><s%> like a tree תִּקְוָתִֽי׃ <S%H8615><s%> and mine hope

וַיַּ֣חַר <S%H2734><s%> He hath also kindled עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> against אַפּ֑וֹ <S%H639><s%> his wrath וַיַּחְשְׁבֵ֖נִי <S%H2803><s%> against me and he counteth ל֣וֹ כְצָרָֽיו׃ <S%H6862><s%> me unto him as [one of] his enemies

יַ֤חַד ׀ <S%H3162><s%> together יָ֘בֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> come גְדוּדָ֗יו <S%H1416><s%> His troops וַיָּסֹ֣לּוּ <S%H5549><s%> and raise up עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> against דַּרְכָּ֑ם <S%H1870><s%> their way וַיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> against me and encamp סָבִ֣יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לְאָהֳלִֽי׃ <S%H168><s%> my tabernacle

אַ֭חַי <S%H251><s%> my brethren מֵעָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and הִרְחִ֑יק <S%H7368><s%> far וְ֝יֹדְעַ֗י <S%H3045><s%> from me and mine acquaintance אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> are completely זָ֥רוּ <S%H2114><s%> are verily estranged מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> at
חָדְל֥וּ <S%H2308><s%> have failed קְרוֹבָ֑י <S%H7138><s%> My kinsfolk וּֽמְיֻדָּעַ֥י <S%H3045><s%> and my familiar friends שְׁכֵחֽוּנִי׃ <S%H7911><s%> have forgotten

גָּ֘רֵ֤י <S%H1481><s%> They that dwell בֵיתִ֣י <S%H1004><s%> in mine house וְ֭אַמְהֹתַי <S%H519><s%> and my maids לְזָ֣ר <S%H2114><s%> me for a stranger תַּחְשְׁבֻ֑נִי <S%H2803><s%> count נָ֝כְרִ֗י <S%H5237><s%> I am an alien הָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> I am בְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> in their sight

לְעַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> my servant קָ֭רָאתִי <S%H7121><s%> I called וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יַעֲנֶ֑ה <S%H6030><s%> and he gave [me] no answer בְּמוֹ־ <S%H1119><s%> him with פִ֝֗י <S%H6310><s%> my mouth אֶתְחַנֶּן־ <S%H2603><s%> I intreated לֽוֹ׃

ר֭וּחִֽי <S%H7307><s%> My breath זָ֣רָה <S%H2114><s%> is strange לְאִשְׁתִּ֑י <S%H802><s%> to my wife וְ֝חַנֹּתִ֗י <S%H2603><s%> am loathsome לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> for the children's בִטְנִֽי׃ <S%H990><s%> [sake] of mine own body
גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even עֲ֭וִילִים <S%H5759><s%> Yea young children מָ֣אֲסוּ <S%H3988><s%> despised בִ֑י אָ֝ק֗וּמָה <S%H6965><s%> me I arose וַיְדַבְּרוּ־ <S%H1696><s%> and they spake בִֽי׃

תִּֽ֭עֲבוּנִי <S%H8581><s%> abhorred כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מְתֵ֣י <S%H4962><s%> friends סוֹדִ֑י <S%H5475><s%> All my inward וְזֶֽה־ <S%H2088><s%> and those אָ֝הַ֗בְתִּי <S%H157><s%> me and they whom I loved נֶהְפְּכוּ־ <S%H2015><s%> are turned בִֽי׃

בְּעוֹרִ֣י <S%H5785><s%> to my skin וּ֭בִבְשָׂרִי <S%H1320><s%> and to my flesh דָּבְקָ֣ה <S%H1692><s%> cleaveth עַצְמִ֑י <S%H6106><s%> My bone וָ֝אֶתְמַלְּטָ֗ה <S%H4422><s%> and I am escaped בְּע֣וֹר <S%H5785><s%> with the skin שִׁנָּֽי׃ <S%H8127><s%> of my teeth

חָנֻּ֬נִי <S%H2603><s%> Have pity חָנֻּ֣נִי <S%H2603><s%> upon me have pity אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you רֵעָ֑י <S%H7453><s%> upon me O ye my friends כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> For יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> for the hand אֱ֝ל֗וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> of God נָ֣גְעָה <S%H5060><s%> hath touched בִּֽי׃

לָ֭מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תִּרְדְּפֻ֣נִי <S%H7291><s%> Why do ye persecute כְמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> as אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> me as God וּ֝מִבְּשָׂרִ֗י <S%H1320><s%> body לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשְׂבָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H7646><s%> and are not satisfied

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Oh יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Oh that אֵ֭פוֹ <S%H645><s%> were now וְיִכָּתְב֣וּן <S%H3789><s%> written מִלָּ֑י <S%H4405><s%> my words מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> oh יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> oh that בַּסֵּ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in a book וְיֻחָֽקוּ׃ <S%H2710><s%> they were printed

בְּעֵט־ <S%H5842><s%> pen בַּרְזֶ֥ל <S%H1270><s%> with an iron וְעֹפָ֑רֶת <S%H5777><s%> and lead לָ֝עַ֗ד <S%H5703><s%> for ever בַּצּ֥וּר <S%H6697><s%> in the rock יֵחָצְבֽוּן׃ <S%H2672><s%> That they were graven

וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יָ֭דַעְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> For I know גֹּ֣אֲלִי <S%H1350><s%> [that] my redeemer חָ֑י <S%H2416><s%> liveth וְ֝אַחֲר֗וֹן <S%H314><s%> at the latter עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on עָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> [day] upon the earth יָקֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> and [that] he shall stand

וְאַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> And [though] after ע֭וֹרִֽי <S%H5785><s%> my skin נִקְּפוּ־ <S%H5362><s%> [worms] destroy זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> from וּ֝מִבְּשָׂרִ֗י <S%H1320><s%> this [body] yet in my flesh אֶֽחֱזֶ֥ה <S%H2372><s%> shall I see אֱלֽוֹהַּ׃ <S%H433><s%> God

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Whom אֲנִ֨י ׀ <S%H589><s%> myself אֶֽחֱזֶה־ <S%H2372><s%> Whom I shall see לִּ֗י וְעֵינַ֣י <S%H5869><s%> for myself and mine eyes רָא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> shall behold וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and not זָ֑ר <S%H2114><s%> and not another כָּל֖וּ <S%H3615><s%> be consumed כִלְיֹתַ֣י <S%H3629><s%> [though] my reins בְּחֵקִֽי׃ <S%H2436><s%> within

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> If תֹ֭אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> But ye should say מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How נִּרְדָּף־ <S%H7291><s%> Why persecute ל֑וֹ וְשֹׁ֥רֶשׁ <S%H8328><s%> we him seeing the root דָּ֝בָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> of the matter נִמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> is found בִֽי׃

גּ֤וּרוּ <S%H1481><s%> Be ye afraid לָכֶ֨ם ׀ מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> of חֶ֗רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For חֵ֭מָה <S%H2534><s%> for wrath עֲוֹנ֣וֹת <S%H5771><s%> [bringeth] the punishments חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> So תֵּדְע֣וּן <S%H3045><s%> that ye may know [שַׁדִּין כ] (שַׁדּֽוּן׃ <S%H1779><s%> cause ק) ס
